socketpp::IP_RawSocket

socketpp::IP_RawSocket Class Reference

IP raw socket, without transport-based protocol. ONLY SENDING METHODS WORK. More...

Detailed Description

IP raw socket, without transport-based protocol. ONLY SENDING METHODS WORK.
